WRITING.TEXT: :) This makes me happy.
Thanks so much for responding.

WRITING.TITLE: MEGATHREAD: Consoles not joining games; "Error starting game, trying again"
WRITING.TEXT:
Seen about a billion posts for this issue, including one of my own, so figure I'd try and make a megathread.
No word on Blizzard on it yet, but hopefully we get something soon. EDIT: Response from Blizzard below!
Mods could we get a sticky to discuss this? Would really help highlight a place to discuss the issue and any potential fixes. Currently a fair amount of console users simply can't get into any games at all.
UPDATE #1: 9:00pm AEST (Australia Eastern Standard Time, ~12 hours since free weekend ended) still can't get into any games. Seems to be fairly contained to Asia-Pacific servers, but not entirely.
UPDATE #2: Almost 1:00am AEST, still can't get into games except for the occasionally lucky one, although I did have more luck in the brawl than in QP. Managed to get in touch with Blizzard CS on twitter and they just said they're still "investigating this issue". Logging off for the night. Here's hoping it's up when I get back up.
UPDATE #3: Patch has supposedly gone through on all platforms and is now fixed!
Lol I don't blame you for sending them an email, in Australia it's usually the ISP
Lol my friends and I were convinced it was the free weekend but it's still a problem now and the free weekend is officially over so no idea
Interesting to hear it's not just Asia Pacific then, I've had lots of people online mention they're in Aus or NZ but must be a bigger problem than that
I'm still consistently getting the error, and it won't join even if I just leave it. Last night I left it and it joined after about 20 minutes, which is really frustrating.
Just as an FYI, me and the other players I know on XLive who've been experiencing it are all in the Asia Pacific region. Don't know if it's specific to there, but it might be.

Doesn't even work at all for me. Nothing. Not QP, Comp, Brawl, AI or even the fucking practice range!!! Skirmishes are the only thing that work but I get booted out of those fairly quickly when it finds a game, which it'll then fail to join

WRITING.TITLE: Heaps of console players are unable to play the game at the moment, it simply says "Error starting game, trying again" when joining any type of game.
WRITING.TEXT:
Heaps of people have been experiencing this, some haven't been able to play for 4 days. No word from Blizzard on what's happening.
http://us.battle.net/forums/en/overwatch/topic/20749017057?page=1
http://us.battle.net/forums/en/overwatch/topic/20744594381?page=1
http://us.battle.net/forums/en/overwatch/topic/20749167131
http://us.battle.net/forums/en/overwatch/topic/20749096760
Multiple people are tweeting @BlizzardCS but nothing so far. Obviously something has happened, but just wish Blizzard would address it...
EDIT: Please go upvote and discuss at the new MEGATHREAD, which includes a response from BLIZZARD! https://www.reddit.com/r/Overwatch/comments/52i8ia/megathread_consoles_not_joining_games_error/
Might be an asia pacific problem

WRITING.TITLE: Blizzard, fix Overwatch on consoles. Nobody can join a game.
WRITING.TEXT:
The free weekend has fucked everything up.
Games will not join, sometimes I can't even get into training range. WTF is up. I know everyone here is a PC player, however have some sympathy for us consoles players who can't even join any games.
It literally just fails to loads, tried another map, and then fails and repeats. Please at least tell us what is going on.

Thanks for calling me dense. I'm really not, I have a solid understanding of how the game works. But thanks anyway.
/s
As the title clarifies, this is for a pointless Mercy rez. These completely exist, and I'm not 'dense' for suggested they do. Even if the rez really would not have made a difference, it can still get POTG. If 3 junkrats commit suicide, then mercy rezzes them, it's POTG. I've tried this and it works. That's not winning us the game, believe me.

WRITING.TITLE: New Brawl Idea!
WRITING.TEXT:
**#ChicksOutForWinston**
* Playable characters are Winston, Tracer and Widowmaker * Map is Ruins: Illios * Tracer has no ammo, can only blink and recall * Tracer and Winston are confined to the centre pit * Widowmaker is confined to outside the pit * Winston is constantly stuck in Primal Rage
Feedback?
In response to one, that's actually not true. If the game is super eventful it will still give it to Mercy. Sorry if I didn't make that clear.

Me and my friends realised that Mercy POTGs were WAY more common than they used to be after the patch, and we had a theory that you could essentially 'force' a POTG as Mercy with any resurrection of 3 or more people.
So we tested it out, and it works... I understand Blizzard have probably done this to allow Mercy to get POTG more often, but something's gone wrong where it now happens way more than it should.
Pls Blizzard, literally unplayable.

WRITING.TITLE: It's now possible to 'force' a Mercy POTG the system will value a pointless 3 man ressurection higher than almost anything else

WRITING.TITLE: An important change to Zenyatta that wasn't in the patch notes...
WRITING.TEXT:
For some reason this wasn't in the patch notes, but Zen no longer counts as capturing/contesting a point whilst he's ulting.
This means you can no longer keep the overtime timer going for the duration of your ult as Zen, which was a great strategy to extend the game and help allow teammates get back to the point after they respawn.
[Example gif here] (https://gfycat.com/SecretBleakKakapo) courtesy of /u/Lysander1077
I presume the same goes for pushing payloads, but I haven't tried that yet.
This is pretty big change, and it shouldn't have gone undocumented IMO. It was great strategy that I used several times :(

The above channel is actually the spinoff online 'show' of an actual Australia TV show (also government funded) which is more dedicated to game reviews and field pieces than quick daily content like above. You can check them out here: https://www.youtube.com/user/goodgameabctv

WRITING.TITLE: The Australian Government funds a fantastic YouTube channel that covers gaming news, discussions and playthroughs. It's a fantastic channel with great content - check it out!
Anyone got an experience using the 360's Gamecom X95 headset on the One?
WRITING.TEXT:
Just trying to set this up, and it's a pain in the ass. It used a wireless receiver to connect to the xbox 360 TV audio back in the day, and then had a seperate plug from the headphones to plug into the 360 controller to receive game chat and send the mircophone signal too.
Naturally, because the Xbox controller can now also send game audio, the wireless audio receiver for the TV is unnecessary. The only problem is the wireless receiver needs to be paired and running for the wired mic/controller cord to operate, but that's fine and can be done easily.
Now here'es the problem. I don't own the chat headset thing from Microsoft that comes with the adapter. HOWEVER, I bought a 2.5mm to 3.5mm jack converter off eBay, which should do the same thing when plugged into the Xbox's headphone jack. I even checked the adapter is microphone compatible too, not just audio. However, when I get it all up and running, I get audio through the wired connection with jack converter, but it won't pick up my microphone as a device that can be used. It doesn't even recognise. My computer doesn't recognise the microphone when using the adapter either. Anyone had any experience with this?
That's kinda part of the show too though, he just uses Facebook in some instances of the show
Not me but lol funny
Lol it was clearly a joke
"A bug in the system."
"Christmas. A holiday rooted in the systematic destruction of the rainforest."

WRITING.TITLE: Video highlights from last night's gig at Splendour in the Grass

WRITING.TEXT:
I remember this guy who had a mic in a competitive game once. He was quite a high rank, communicating when needed, but not really playing that well. Stuffed up his ult timing and some other stuff every now and then.
After he stuffed up one too many times, he used his mic to loudly belch for all the team to hear and then said "Sorry guys, probs had one too many beeries this arvo". (He's Australian, so say this with a twangy bogan accent)
He still communicated when needed though. If this guy can do it, you can too.

WRITING.TITLE: Lucio's wall ride got a pretty big buff in the latest patch, and I'm not sure anyone's noticed besides this guy

WRITING.TEXT: Yep, very true. Oh well. We'll move on.

Yeah sure, understand the reasoning but I feel like you had much more of a chance to turn and deal with Sym turrets than you ever have with torbjorn, mostly due to the lower DPS of her turret plus Torbjorn's has insta-lock on, which makes it WAY harder when coupled with the damage it does.
